entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Clarenville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning except mainly cloudy along parts of the coast. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds except mainly cloudy along parts of the coast this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Windy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
